document_data.name: Jamala Abd al-Raffa
document_data.home: [[Cities of the Pantheon|League of the Pantheon]], [[Zakhara]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Jamala Abd al-Raffa''' was a [[mamluk]] inhabiting the [[Cities of the Pantheon|League of the Pantheon]] in [[Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|21}}
document_data.Activities: Jamala was the leader of the [[Exalted Mamluk Society]] and named Most Respected Warrior. She was a [[moralist]] who shared the views of the Pantheon that all of Zakhara should be more civilized and law-abiding.
